article.description: — Michael Christmas scored 15 points as Longwood beat Charleston Southern 77-56 on Saturday night.
article.headline: Christmas scores 15, Longwood beats Charleston Southern 77-56
article.linkText: Christmas scores 15, Longwood beats Charleston Southern 77-56
article.story: FARMVILLE, Va. -- — Michael Christmas scored 15 points as Longwood beat Charleston Southern 77-56 on Saturday night. Christmas shot 6 for 9, including 3 for 4 from beyond the arc for the Lancers (13-4, 1-1 Big South Conference). Szymon Zapala added 13 points while finishing 6 of 10 from the floor, and he also had five rebounds. D'Avian Houston was 4 of 6 shooting and 5 of 5 from the free throw line to finish with 13 points. Taje' Kelly finished with 19 points and nine rebounds for the Buccaneers (4-11, 0-2). Daren Patrick added 15 points and six rebounds for Charleston Southern. RJ Johnson also recorded nine points. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
